name: LimitedActions
description:
LimitedActions Description

LimitedActions is a game where every action you make will have a big impact on the whole level, reducing the space available! So be careful which path you'll go to choose. Most of them are deadly! 

Because of the limited amount of time for the development, the gameplay is not very long and there are some little mistakes in level design and grammar, which I'm very sorry. 18Levels + BossFight

Because of my passion for making strange things in my games. I add a stupid and non-sense story about one of my projects characters. 
The main character of the game is also the narrator/teacher.. in the dialogues you can find a lot of grammar mistakes. 

## Controls

WASD:   - Movements 

Arrow Keys:  - Shooting 

SPACE: - SuperPower 

X:  Interaction with dialogues 

Q: Close dialogues 

That's everything!! I really enjoyed my first LudumDare, was a fantastic experience. 
I really hope you like the game and also I REALLY HOPE there are not many bugs, haha!

Thanks,
Stroe
